Articles.Content:
ı install ksp without mods on 64 bit win 7 there was no problem. ı change OS to 32 bit win 7 and install Ksp without mods but when ı enter second time vab(Vehicle Assembly Building),it  gives me crash report. when try to run ksp_x64.exe it says it is not suitable for this version of OS.

how can ı solve this problem please help me

Let's take this one step at a time.

- Your game crashed on Win 7 32-bit because you ran out of memory. A 32-bit OS can only access up to 4GB of total System RAM, around 1~1.5GB of which will be used for basic OS background processes. This doesn't leave enough RAM to run a typical unmodded KSP game (requires at least 2~2.5GB RAM)

- Win 7 32-bit can only run 32-bit programs, whereas Win 7 64-bit can run both 32- and 64-bit programs

My advice is to go back to using Win 7 64-bit, since that OS can access more System RAM to run both your OS and the game at the same time.

first ı am not running out of memory my pc specs

CPU 2.4Ghz  intel i7

Ram  8gb

Graphic Card 2gb Nvidia

secondly

ı have some other programs that work only 32 bit for that reason ı have to be in 32 bit win 7. for that reason ı asked if ı can solve the problem without changing my OS to 64 bit

7 hours ago, sumghai said:

Let's take this one step at a time.

- Your game crashed on Win 7 32-bit because you ran out of memory. A 32-bit OS can only access up to 4GB of total System RAM, around 1~1.5GB of which will be used for basic OS background processes. This doesn't leave enough RAM to run a typical unmodded KSP game (requires at least 2~2.5GB RAM)

- Win 7 32-bit can only run 32-bit programs, whereas Win 7 64-bit can run both 32- and 64-bit programs

My advice is to go back to using Win 7 64-bit, since that OS can access more System RAM to run both your OS and the game at the same time

first ı am not running out of memory my pc specs

CPU 2.4Ghz  intel i7

Ram  8gb

Graphic Card 2gb Nvidia

secondly

ı have some other programs that work only 32 bit for that reason ı have to be in 32 bit win 7. for that reason ı asked if ı can solve the problem without changing my OS to 64 bit

Hi @faruk, it is possible you're running out of memory, but I'd have to see your crash log and output log to be sure, see here for details.

The trouble is that your 32bit Windows 7 OS cannot use your 8 gigabytes of RAM, it can only use 4, though only about 3.7 gigabytes are actually available of those 4.

See here for Windows 7 32bit memory limits.

Also, a 32bit Windows OS can only use 2 gigabytes for programs, or 3 gigabytes with certain options enabled but these are limited to Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Professional.

It's possible to make Windows 7 32bit use more than 4 gigabytes using paged address extensions, but this is only useful on servers to run more processes at the same time and won't raise the limit of 2 gigabytes of RAM for users applications.

KSP is nearing the limit of what a 32bit Windows OS will cope with, especially if the graphics settings are on high, but you can make it work if you set the texture quality to a low setting, the lower the better.

Try setting the texture quality to "Eighth res", KSP will use a lot less RAM.

Another thing you can try is forcing KSP to use OpenGL, make a shortcut to the KSP.exe and edit its properties, then add this to the 'Target' box.

Quote

 -force-glcore

Please note that KSp is not designed to run with OpenGL on Windows, so you may see graphical glitches or no graphics at all.

Hope this helps.

It's possible to make Windows 7 32bit use more than 4 gigabytes using paged address extensions, but this is only useful on servers to run more processes at the same time and won't raise the limit of 2 gigabytes of RAM for users applications.

KSP is nearing the limit of what a 32bit Windows OS will cope with, especially if the graphics settings are on high, but you can make it work if you set the texture quality to a low setting, the lower the better.

thanks ı didn t know the limiter of win

ı always thought that even in 32bit or 64bit ı am using 8 gb ram. ı think that is the problem ı will try reducing the graph spec of ksp
